statements: DELETE FROM Credit_Risk WHERE customer_id = 123 AND credit_score > 700;
DELETE FROM Credit_Risk WHERE credit_score < 600 OR customer_id = 456;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_date <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE id = 5 AND credit_score < 600;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PaymentHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 123 AND status = 'pending';
